high_descs: Turn around, go toward the door, then turn left to face the bed.
Pick up the nearest pillow on the bed.
Turn around, go straight, then turn right to face the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pillow in the light.

high_descs: Turn around and move to stand at the head of the bed on the side closest to the door.
Pick up the pillow that's closest to you.
Turn around and carry the pillow to end of the dresser where the lamp is.
Touch the lamp with the pillow, which will turn it on.
anns.task_desc: Turn the lamp on by knocking it over with a pillow.

high_descs: turn around, walk to the door, turn left,walk to the bed
grab the pillow on the bed
turn around, walk to the dresser
turn on the lamp on the dresser, knock the lamp down
anns.task_desc: grab the pillow on the bed, turn on the lamp and knock it down
